title: Total confirmed COVID-19 deaths per million vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Due to varying protocols and challenges in the attribution of the cause of death, the number of confirmed deaths may not accurately represent the true number of deaths caused by COVID-19. GDP per capita is adjusted for price differences between countries (it is expressed in international dollars).

display.name: Confirmed COVID-19 deaths per million people

sourceDesc: WHO COVID-19 Dashboard; Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
